data.title: How to update applications installed on your computer with Kaspersky Small Office Security 6
data.meta_description: Learn how to update installed applications with Kaspersky Small Office Security 6.
data.text:
Updating installed applications improves the security of your computer. Using Kaspersky Small Office Security, you can search for, download, and install updates for the applications on your computer.

Kaspersky Small Office Security searches for updates regularly and, if any are available, shows them in a notification in the lower-right corner of the screen. Click Show to view the available updates.

Click Update all to install all detected updates or install some of the updates by clicking Update for each of them.

You can also start the search for application updates manually. See the guide in the block below.

What to do in case of update problems

Kaspersky Small Office Security will show a notification if it is unable to install an update for an application.

In order to fix this issue:

Restart your PC.

Log in to the administrator account on your computer.

Check your Internet connection.

Close all running applications.

Try running the update once again.

If the issue persists, submit a request to Kaspersky Customer Service by choosing the topic of your request.
